plot: Having adopted a daughter and raised her with love as his own, a father discovers that their is a thin line between love and hate when that same daughter begins dating the son of his mistress
title: Gureumi hoteogol dae
plot_es: Having adopted a daughter and raised her with love as his own, a father discovers that their is a thin line between love and hate when that same daughter begins dating the son of his mistress
plot_en: Having adopted a daughter and raised her with love as his own, a father discovers that their is a thin line between love and hate when that same daughter begins dating the son of his mistress
